thread.title: Purported CIA Operative Indicted on Fraud Charges
thread.title_full: Purported CIA Operative Indicted on Fraud Charges - WSJ

author: Maria Armental
title: Purported CIA Operative Indicted on Fraud Charges
text:
A Maryland man who built a career on the claim he was a Central Intelligence Agency operative combating world-wide terrorism, drug and arms smuggling, and espionage was arrested Thursday on charges he defrauded the U.S. government.
Wayne Shelby Simmons, 62 years old, a Fox News guest commentator and founding member of the Citizensâ€™ Commission on Benghazi, a private group looking into the 2012 terrorist attack on the U.S. diplomatic compound in that Libyan city, was indicted by a grand jury on felony charges, including...
